CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, April 6, 1957, pg. 15 reads: "7. Harry E. Marlin represented the Davis Brothers Company water and heating systems displaying Jettronair and Rudd hot water heaters"
TitMainTitle: Harry E. Marlin standing in Davis Brothers Company booth promoting Jettronair, in Syria Mosque for the 1957 Pittsburgh Courier Home Service Fair
